LanguageData.Gun_DoomsdayRocket.description: A single-use heavy modified rocket launcher using parts from spacecraft cannons. It fires an antigrain mini-warhead that can create an massive explosion. For quick retribution & devastation, almost leaving nothing but destruction and leaving a large blast of smoke.\n\nBecause of this, along with its unwieldiness, single-use limitation, & the massive destruction it causes in it's wake, one must be slightly crazy or even mad to even fire this weapon.
LanguageData.Gun_TripleRocket.description: A single-use triple-barreled heavy rocket launcher that fires a cluster of three large explosive rockets. Good against swarms of weaker enemies or stationary structures.\n\nIt appears to be based on a prototype for destroying medium or light armored vehicles, but because of its unwieldiness, single-use & bellow average armor penetration capabilities, it's not very effective against heavily armored targets.
